requirements.description: You agree not to use any Service for applications labeled or described as 'Kids' or 'Children' applications.

type.summary: 禁止将服务用于针对儿童的应用程序

requirements.description: You agree not to use any Service in connection with applications, advertisements, or services directed towards children under the age of 17.

type.summary: 禁止将服务用于针对17岁以下儿童的广告或服务

requirements.description: You agree not to collect any personal information from children.

type.summary: 禁止收集儿童的个人信息

requirements.description: You agree not to request or permit any Ad Partner or Attribution Partner to transmit any personal information from children under the age of 17 to Flurry.

type.summary: 禁止第三方将17岁以下儿童的个人信息传输给Flurry

requirements.description: Compliance with the Network Advertising Initiative 2020 Code of Conduct, Section D.II.1 is required.

type.summary: 需要遵守网络广告倡议2020行为准则，第D.II.1节
